This is for the ones ...lost:

- First enter the game's menu normally and in OPTIONS/ONLINE...close those two...features.
- Enter your network connections/firewall settings/Exceptions and unchecked the TWO lines reffering to MASS EFFECT game.
- Run the DLC (each "exe")
- Copy in game's menu and run that crack
- LET THE internet connection ON ! Otherwise the game it will give that error in the main menu! And it will give also an error if you think you can solve it running again that crack.

Do all these and the game will WORK 100%

is there ANY way to get the DLC working without an internet connection?

@ Ploppy10 - I worked out the fix a while ago but only just noticed your reply, sry -

1.If you are recieving the error about authorizing installed DLC (a common problem) try these steps:-
a.Remove both Mass Effect 2 entries from your windows firewall exceptions list, simply untick them both.

b.Install each DLC file. Windows 7 may say they didn't install properly - just tell it that they did.

c.Reload your 1.01 crack patch (fixed .exe) - as mentioned above the new DLC installs patch 1.01 WITHOUT ASKING, so re-crack your game afterwards.

d.Enable your internet connection, then run the 'giveme2entitlements.exe' or any other DLC crack. If it asks you to replace the .ini file, select Yes. (If your net connection is not active you will recieve an error from the DLC crack).

e.With your Internet connection still enabled, run the game. (DO NOT have any firewall apps running either for this step) On the main menu, you should now see the menu options load without any 'Unable to authorized DLC' message :)

f.Now ALT-TAB back to your desktop & disable your internet connection. Go back into the game (click the icon in the taskbar) & click on 'Exit Game'. 

g.From now on you can now run the game without the net connection & your DLC will stay authorized :)

h.If you add more DLC in the future & you get the 'Unauthorized error' again, simply repeat the above steps to re-enable it.

The key is not having a firewall running when authorizing for the 1st time :)

Works perfectly. Had some trouble at first so I'll post some steps.

1. Start Mass Effect 2 and enter extras/options/online. Switch off both of the available options.
2. Run all of the DLCs straight from the download folder.
3. Copy the crack to the binaries folder in your install location and run the app.
4. Start up the game and activate the new content from the start menu.
5. Enjoy!
